summary:
this mod adds a follower named ernesto in sleeping giant in riverwood
you can hire him to follow you,he is a imperial so he will attack stormcloaks is his sight.
and he is not essential but he\'ll respawn in sleeping giant again if die.
descriptionHtml:
this mod adds a follower named ernesto in sleeping giant in riverwood
you can hire him to follow you,he is a imperial so he will attack stormcloaks is his sight.
and he is not essential but he\'ll respawn in sleeping giant again if die.
or if not respawned go to console write \"help ernesto\" then it will show its code ID
then write \"player.placeatme #\" \"#=ID code\"
enjoy.
author: Passerby
